casebody.data:
In the Matter of GENERAL GAS & ELECTRIC CORPORATION. GENERAL GAS & ELECTRIC CORPORATION, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 209. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 18, 1935. Thomas J. Todarelli, of New York City, for appellant. F. W. H. Adams, U. S. Atty., of New York City (James V. Hayes and Francis A. Mahony, Asst. U. S. Attys., and Craigh Leonard, Sp. Asst. U. S. Atty., all of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
